overview: Tami Monroe slings hash (and that ain't all) with her gorgeous girlfriends at a down-home, country diner. While passionate Pam is "serving" the country agent, Scandinavian bombshell Inga is wiping things up with the janitor! Ah, but Miss Tami takes the cake! From hitting a horny home run with a baseball player to a spicy three-way orgy at the end, this little dynamo proves she's the hottest dish in town!
title: Kiss My Grits
